sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PDSwimLaneService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Interacting with PD Diagram swim lanes</description>
        <name>PDSwimLaneService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PDSwimLaneService = Class.create();
PDSwimLaneService.prototype = {
    initialize: function(opts) {
		this.repository = (opts && opts.repository) || new PDSwimLaneRepository();
	},
	type: 'PDSwimLaneService',
	insertSwimLanes: function(swimLanes) {
		return (swimLanes || []).map(function(fields) {
			return this.repository.insertSwimLane(fields);
		}.bind(this));
	},
	updateSwimLanes: function(swimLanes) {
		return (swimLanes || []).map(function(fields) {
			return this.repository.updateSwimLane(fields);
		}.bind(this));
	},
	deleteSwimLanes: function(swimLaneIds) {
		this.repository.deleteSwimLanes((swimLaneIds || []).join(','));
	}
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-22 22:01:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5518cc11c7870110bfbaf89f51c26001</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>67</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PDSwimLaneService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5518cc11c7870110bfbaf89f51c26001</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-02-28 00:49:56</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
